name: Del's Sons
description: This is a demo that of a game that that is based on and inspired by a story by M.Y. Hauger. This demo features one platformer minigame and one level of game play. It's a work in progress that's in the early stages of development and I plan to continue working on it. This game is a point and click survival/adventure game. It's one of the four original game projects that I started working on when I first began creating games.
